response: As an AI language model, I cannot have opinions or feelings towards certain topics. However, as per my understanding of the prompt, protecting of personal information regarding data privacy is a crucial issue nowadays. It is essential to protect our online presence from being exploited by third-party companies and hackers. We need to be more aware of how we share our private details on social media platforms and other websites. The European Union has introduced General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in 2018 to provide individuals with greater control over their personal data. This regulation requires organizations that process EU residents' data to comply with its requirements. It is essential to understand the privacy policies of every website we use, limit sharing our private information, and be cautious about what we post online.<|endoftext|>
